android.provider
Interface Telephony.TextBasedSmsColumns

All Known Implementing Classes:
Telephony.Sms, Telephony.Sms.Conversations, Telephony.Sms.Draft, Telephony.Sms.Inbox, Telephony.Sms.Outbox, Telephony.Sms.Sent
Enclosing class:
Telephony
public static interface Telephony.TextBasedSmsColumns

Base columns for tables that contain text based SMSs.
